thread.section_title: WeBuyCars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WeBuyCars.com | www.webuycars.com
thread.title: Lynda Hutson

author: Lynda Hutson
title: Lynda Hutson
text: You can't beat this anywhere. I called for an appointment, Heber was early for our meet. He was really an outstanding guy. The kind of guy that looks you in the eye when speaking, and listens to everything carefully. Heber took the time to inspect my truck, and explained everything along the way. Don't take the first offer. Paperwork is smooth and painless. Money in my account the next day. No hassles, perfect way to sell your vehicle!!!
